rules_text:
When Port Rose Lieutenant enters the battlefield, exile target creature or Vehicle an opponent controls until Port Rose Lieutenant leaves the battlefield.
Port Rose Lieutenant has ward {3} as long as you control three or more artifacts.
notes:
WU:
 - Five or more artifacts
 - Metalcraft
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
